title: PayPal script
content: does anyone know where i can find a script that tells u the last donation that a person may have made by paypal?Rorie

title: Re: PayPal script
content:
I'm not familiar with PayPal but I'd assume there'd be some option for each users to do transactions without other people seeing whatever they've done. So, I'd guess it's not possible.. Probably the official PayPal site has info about that, dunno. title: Re: PayPal script
content:
HTML? I don't think that's possible, you'd need dynamic pages and HTML are static, not dynamic.

Sure, there's Javascript for HTML, but that's too limited to access a database like PayPal's.____________

title: Re: PayPal script
content:
It's still possible to put stuff in HTML pages though.
Like you said, embed JavaScript, Shockwave/Flash, or something like that, or just generate the HTML on the server with PHP, ASP for instance.
No idea whatsoever about PayPal though.Retodon8
